resources.string: The aim of this app is to retrieve music collection from the discogs.com website and make it playable.\n The music collection can be browsed by artist, by album, or randomly.
This activity shows the list of artists, retrieved from the discogs.com API.\n As an example here only PHIL COLLINS can be selected !
This activity shows the complete album collection, retrieved from the discogs.com API.\n As an example the only active album is BUT SERIOUSLY !
In this activity the user can chose an album from the selected artist. This list comes from the discogs.com API. As an example the only active album is BUT SERIOUSLY !
In this activity all songs from an album are listed and can be played thanks to the MediaPlayer.\nSong titles are retrieved from the discog.com API.
That\'s Just the Way It Is\n5\'20
I Wish It Would Rain Down\n5\'28
Find a Way to My Heart\n6\'08
